title: Poster-Based Collaborative Learning for Comprehensive Pharmacy Exam Preparation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Students perform blended collaborative learning using personal devices, systematically organizing pharmaceutical knowledge through poster creation and discussions. Formative assessments monitor learning progress continuously

learning_goals: Students can summarize pharmacological treatments for 11 major disease conditions in poster format
Improve poster content by providing peer feedback at least three times through collaborative learning
Achieve over 70% accuracy rate on comprehensive exam (NAPLEX-style) practice questions
Achieve over 80% participation and assignment completion rates in formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
